info.name: MangaStream - Black
info.description:
Changes MangaStream.com to black background.  Applied to all pages except the forums.  Ads have been removed, but you shouldn't see them anyway if you have Adblock Plus installed.  Tested only with Firefox/Stylish.

Full size main page:
http://sadpanda.us/images/205779-NXQV6EO.png

Full size reading page:
http://sadpanda.us/images/205780-GX3ULS0.png
info.additionalInfo:
2011 Apr 13: Removed white box at top of reading pages.
2010 Sep 07: Adjusted button colors.
2010 Aug 31: Main page & directory pages are now black as well.  Reading pages updated slightly.
2010 May 30: Only reading pages are black.  (Original)
